name: Clericot
description: Clericot is a refreshing Uruguayan drink! It is basically composed of white wine and fruits. Perfect for the summer.
directions: Get a jar to receive the ingredients
Cut the fruits of your choice (it is really good with oranges, kiwis, apples and pineapples) in medium pieces (filling 2 cups)
Add the orange juice to the jar
Add ice (as much as you want)
